**Kinase assay**
Following preparation of MEKK1 immunoprecipitates \(as above),
Incubate with 7 µg of JNKK1\(K131M) along with 5 µCi of \[γ-<sup>32</sup>P]ATP in Kinase Assay Buffer for 30 min at 30 ˚C.
